title: Zepto Staff Software Engineer
content:
Education: M.Tech in ECE (B.Tech Tier 2 college, M.Tech Tier 1 college)
Years of Experience: 7
Prior Experience: FAAMG

Date of the Offer: Septmeber 2024
Company: Zepto
Title/Level: Staff Software Engineer
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: 85L
Joining Bonus: 10L
Stock bonus: 1.2 Cr esops grant vested over 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 1.25 Cr

Other details: This was their first offer had 5L less base.
Don't have any competing offer.
 
Previous comp: 78 L
